column5: We have owned Play-N-Hooky as a second home since September 2008. It is waterfront. We have a volleyball court, basketball backboard, and horse shoes for fun play. We have eight high deck chairs and a porch swing up on the deck. Down below we have eight chairs, a hammock, and three swings. There is a hot and cold shower down below deck for easy sand clean off after beach time. There is a barbeque gas grill.
